title: Ticket #7422: Fix NEGOTIATOR_DEPTH_FIRST with custom SLOT_WEIGHT
description: NEGOTIATOR_DEPTH_FIRST assumes that SLOT_WEIGHT is set to the default value of Cpus. If the slot weight expression is set differently, it will mis-count the number of jobs that will fit in a pslot. It also will over-count the number of jobs by one if the pslot's Cpus isn't a multiple of the job's RequestCpus.
